lead_paragraph: Our story begins outside, The Uptown Bar, burlesque club, the scene of a vicious murder. Nick Hamilton (Richard Crenna Jr.), a professional gangster, has made the last deal of his life. Flash back 24 hours as local Detective Harry Reese questions th
